altTitles.ja: 悪祓士のキヨシくん

description.en: The most powerful exorcist in history--Kiyoshi! In order to protect that which is precious to him, Kiyoshi has attained ultimate strength. But he has a secret he can't tell anyone... Become a sword that slays evil! Become a shield that protects the weak!
description.ja: 祓清は史上最強の悪祓士（エクソシスト）。弱冠16歳にして初任務にあたっていた。しかし、本当は超ビビり＋ド級の人見知りで…!?　ほんの少しの勇気を胸に、悪魔を祓え!!
description.es-la: El exorcista más poderoso de la historia--¡Kiyoshi! Para poder proteger aquello que considera precioso, Kiyoshi ha obtenido una fuerza sin igual. Pero tiene un secreto que no puede revelar... ¡Conviértete en una espada que corta el mal! ¡Se un escudo que protege a los débiles! ¡Todo eso y más se junta en esta nueva serie de exorcismo, batallas y comedia!
description.pt-br: O exorcista mais poderoso da história: Kiyoshi Harai! Para proteger o que é precioso para ele, Kiyoshi atingiu a força suprema. Mas ele tem um segredo que não pode contar a ninguém... ele virou a espada que erradica o mal! O escudo que protege os fracos! Tudo se junta nessa nova série dramática de comédia e batalha de exorcistas!

altTitles.ja: 薔薇色ノ約束

description.en:
Iroha, the daughter of a good family, has just lost her father and was grieving in her garden when an arrogant but handsome man dressed in a military uniform trespasses and changes her life forever…  
  
The latest manga from Kaho Miyasaka set in a Taisho era-esque world.
With no savings, average qualifications, and a bank balance consistently below 10,000 won, can the Backbone Breaker Gye Baeksun really escape unemployment?

altTitles.ja: NHKにようこそ!

description.en: Sato Tatsuhiro is a drug-addled "hikikomori" (a Japanese shut-in) who thinks a sinister organization, NHK (Nihon Hikikomori Kyoukai), is the cause of all his problems! He falls in love with a girl, Misaki, who he thinks is trying to assassinate him, but doesn't know how to talk to her or if he can trust her. The more he stays in his house watching anime porn, reading manga, and doing drugs, the harder it is for him to leave. Only Misaki can keep him from rotting away in his own apartment!
description.ru: Заговоры. Повсюду. Nippon Hikikomori Kyokai. Добро пожаловать в Одиночество. Добро пожаловать в Ряды Отвергнутых Обществом. Ты — хикикомори, и твоя жизнь ничтожна. Если, конечно, вдруг не появится девушка под солнечным зонтиком и не скажет, что спасёт тебя… Непревзойдённая манга, раскрывающая множество проблем современного японского общества. Колкая, жёсткая, необычайно живая, она заставляет задуматься о таких вещах, как удача, судьба, положение в обществе и, конечно же, жизнь в самом широком понимании смысла этого слова.
description.uk: Безробітний двадцятидворічний Сато Тацухіро рідко залишає свою квартиру. Він хікікоморі – відлюдькуватий соціофоб. І невідомо скільки б це тривало, якби одного дня у його двері не постукала дивачка на ім'я Місакі. Постійно згадуючи про якийсь проект, вони обіцяє повернути Сато до світу нормальних людей.

title.en: Ryoushin no Shakkin wo Katagawari shite morau Jouken wa Nihon Ichi Kawaii Joshikousei to Issho ni Kurasu koto deshita.

altTitles.ja: 両親の借金を肩代わりしてもらう条件は日本一可愛い女子高生と一緒に暮らすことでした。

altTitles.en: I'm Gonna Live with You Not Because My Parents Left Me Their Debt But Because I Like You

altTitles.zh: 替我父母偿还债务的条件是与日本最可爱的女高中生同居。

altTitles.zh-ro: Tì wǒ fùmǔ chánghuán zhàiwù de tiáojiàn shì yǔ rìběn zuì kě'ài de nǚ gāozhōng shēng tóngjū.

description.en:
The main character, Yoshizumi Yuya, was being pressured into paying off the debt left by his parents who had fled abroad. It was his classmate, Hitotsuba Kaede, chosen as the cutest schoolgirl in Japan, who saved him from this crisis of life and death. However, there was a catch. The condition required to fulfill in return for taking over his debt was — "In return for the loan, you have – to live with me."
“Why did that happen?!”

Yuya's daily life collapsed on this day.

"Yuya-kun. Let’s take a bath together."
"Yuya-kun, please be my hug pillow."
"That’s enough, Hitotsuba-san!"
description.id: Tokoh utama, Yoshizumi Yuya, dipaksa untuk melunasi hutang yang ditinggalkan oleh orang tuanya yang melarikan diri ke luar negeri. Itu adalah teman sekelasnya, Hitotsuba Kaede, terpilih sebagai siswi terimut di Jepang, yang menyelamatkannya dari krisis hidup dan mati ini. Namun, ada motif tersembunyi di balik itu. Syarat yang harus dipenuhi sebagai imbalan untuk melunasi utangnya adalah — “Sebagai imbalan atas pinjaman itu, kau harus tinggal bersamaku.” “Kenapa jadi begitu?!” Kehidupan sehari-hari Yuya runtuh pada hari ini. “Yuya-kun. Ayo mandi bersama.” “Yuya-kun, jadilah bantal pelukku.” “Cukup, Hitotsuba-san!” Kisah cinta komedi romantis yang menggugah antara Hitotsuba Kaede yang cantik namun santai dan Yoshizumi Yuya yang serius dan keras kepala, dimulai sekarang!
description.ja:
第1巻の内容紹介: 糖度300％の同棲ラブコメ
両親が借金3000万を残して海外逃亡…！？追い詰められた吉住勇也の前に、不意に現れたのは社長令嬢の同級生・一葉楓。勇也も密かに憧れていた日本一可愛い女子高生1位に選ばれた楓は、彼女は意外な提案をするが

Dai 1-kan no naiyō shōkai: Tōdo 300-pāsento no dōsei rabu kome ryōshin ga shakkin 3000 man o nokoshite kaigai tōbō…!? Oitsumerareta Yoshizumi Yūya no mae ni, fui ni arawareta no wa shachō reijō no dōkyūsei 一葉楓. Yūya mo hisoka ni akogarete ita nihon'ichi kawaii mesukōsei 1-i ni eraba reta kaede wa, kanojo wa igaina teian o suruga.

altTitles.zh: Fate kaleid liner 魔法少女☆伊莉雅

altTitles.ja: Fate/kaleid liner プリズマ☆イリヤ ドライ! !

description.en:
Just as Miyu was about to be saved from being swallowed by despair, all of a sudden mysterious duo that mastered Heroic Spirit Class Card system appears in front of Illya!  
  
(A direct continuation of the second act, "2wei" - manga upholds the tradition of having punny names based on german numbers and was appropriately titled "3rei", which comes from deutsch "drei" meaning "three".)  


---
description.fr:
Il s'agit d'un spin-off de la série Fate/Stay Night.  
  
Rin Tohsaka est une mage chargée par Zelretch de collecter les cartes des sept servants dispersées dans la ville de Fuyuki. Malheureusement, elle découvre qu'elle ne peut pas utiliser la magie de Ruby, son sceptre.  
Rin va alors découvrir en Illyasviel von Einzbern un potentiel pour devenir magical girl à sa place. Illya va alors utiliser le Kaleido Stick Ruby pour collecter les cartes tout en étant supervisée par Rin.  
  
La petite fille va également découvrir une rivale et amie de taille nommée Miyu Edelfelt, qui avait pour maître Luviagelita Edelfelt, la rivale de Rin.  
  
Par ailleurs, pendant la collecte de cartes, Illya va découvrir une autre jeune fille lui ressemblant étrangement : Kuroe. Cette dernière n'a pas l'intention de la laisser remplir sa mission et tente de l'éliminer.

description.en: A transfer student desperately seeking someone to relate to pursues the attention of a mysterious boy covered in bandages, thinking he might finally be able to build a friendship for the first time since a tragic accident.

title.en: Kemomimi Meido ga Ie ni iru

altTitles.ja: けもみみメイドが家にいる

altTitles.en: My Animal-Eared Maid Is at Home

altTitles.ja-ro: Kemomimi Meido ga Ie ni iru

altTitles.vi: Nàng hầu gái tai thú sống tại nhà tôi

altTitles.es-la: Mi criada con orejas de animal está en casa

description.en: A loose collection of stories about the daily life of the animal-eared maid Kikimora and her master.
description.vi: Một ngày nọ Main vô tình tìm được một nữ bán nhân và hốt về làm maid, nội dung câu truyện xoay quanh cuộc sống hằng ngày của hai người.
description.es-la: Una historia sobre la vida cotidiana de la criada de orejas de animal Kikimora y su amo.

altTitles.ja: ロボットポンコッツ

description.en:
Based on the video game of the same name by Hudson Soft & Red Company, this manga follows the story of a boy who finds a robot and uses him to battle against other robots.

Note: Numbering is based on both Greatest and Specialist Editions (combines 1 & 2)

altTitles.ja: 千夏のうた

description.en: The series takes place at a certain Japanese location, where a girl moves in with her aunt to a new house after experiencing some more or less shocking events back home. There she meets a boy named Fuyuki, who she from then on spends a lot of time with. The thing special about Chinatsu is her voice, a voice which many seem to have heard before, but from where? What's so special about this girl, and what'll happen in the future?

altTitles.ja: スマザー・ミー

description.en: In the oppressive city of Detroit, Akio is sold by his dad and becomes an assassin known as Snake. Day after day, he simply follows orders. But suddenly, he meets a blind girl and finds new meaning in life…!
description.vi: Detroit là thành phố nơi người lớn thống trị mọi thứ. Akio bị bán, trở thành sát thủ với tên gọi là Rắn. Cuộc sống hàng ngày của cậu chỉ là tuân theo mệnh lệnh. Một ngày, cậu gặp một cô gái mù và dần dần tìm ra ý nghĩa mới của cuộc sống...

description.en:
Gamin Yoon, a 17 year old student, goes to a school known to harbor future criminals. Stuck in a carnivorous environment where only the strongest survive, he struggles to get good grades to enter a 4 year university. But, will he be able to study well enough to enter university, or will he get involved in the unending fights around the school?  


---

[Official Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/CAMPUS/pizixueba/list?title_no=1467)

title.en: The mermaid trapped in my lake

description.en: “Servane, why didn’t you come see me?” A person, no, a mermaid, calling out to my great-grandfather’s granddaughter who resembled me. My ancestors, who loved mermaids so much, are said to have locked her in a lake. What was the mermaid thinking all this time, waiting for someone who had been dead for over a hundred years? Enduring terrible pain, day after day, every single day. That was probably, “I wanted to see you.” … It was clearly revenge.

altTitles.ja: 空手小公子こひなたみのる
空手小公子小日向海流

description.en: Kohinata Minoru is a college student at a college that is popular for its sports rather than academic orientation. He starts out as a gymnast alongside his friend, Nana, but is bullied by his gymnast seniors. One evening, a karate student at the college, Mutou Ryuuji, witnesses Minoru being bullied and comes to his rescue and drags him into the world of karate. Minoru makes new friends and learns some of their dark pasts, including a shocking death that reveals motives for revenge. (from Baka-Updates)

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

title.en: Touhou Bougetsushou ~ Silent Sinner in Blue.

altTitles.de: Östliches Zitat des Flüchtigen Mondes ~ Silent Sinner in Blue

altTitles.en: Touhou Bougetsushou ~ Silent Sinner in Blue

altTitles.ja: 東方儚月抄 ~ Silent Sinner in Blue

description.en:
東方儚月抄 (romanized Touhou Bougetsushou, meaning Eastern Ephemeral Moon Vignette) is a loosely interconnected storyline about the Lunarians that includes Silent Sinner in Blue, Cage in Lunatic Runagate, and Inaba of the Moon and Inaba of the Earth.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.pt:
Yukari Yakumo, a youkai das fronteiras, ela compareceu descontraída enquanto bebia o chá no Santuário Hakurei, ela pediu para que a sacerdotisa estudasse sobre a divinação para futuros eventos. A sacerdotisa achou a idéia maluca da Youkai e levou por brincadeira os planos da Youkai.  
Logo depois, Yukari montou uma invasão contra lua há mais de 1000 anos atrás, porém, o seu plano não deu certo, agora, ela pede auxilio para os Youkais residentes de Gensokyo para mais uma tentativa de invasão.

altTitles.ja: あまサドアンソロジー

description.en:
Intense stimulation and sweet temptation ♥

With the theme of "Being gently teased by a girl," these stories capture the moments when girls show a subtle sadistic charm in everyday life, offering sweet experiences without harsh insults or painful acts.
description.ja: 『女の子に優しく責められる』を合言葉に、日常のふとした瞬間に女の子が見せるサディスティックな魅力を切り取った、罵倒や痛そうな行為は一切NGな甘々体験…。最強美麗な執筆陣で、はちみつのようなスイート体験をあなたにご提案…。

altTitles.ja: ザ・ワールド・イズ・マイン

description.en: Meet Mon, a violent killer faithful only to his own eruptive desires, and his timid companion Toshi, a demolition-devil with a fanatical thirst for destruction. Their killing-spree across Japan is destined to intersect the path of the enormous "Higumadon," a mysterious beast on a Godzilla-like rampage from Hokkaido to Tokyo.

title.en: The absolute ruler of the house

description.en: One day, the end of the world suddenly came. [The absolute being in the corner of the house cannot leave the corner of the house] You must survive to save your family.

altTitles.ja: 龍とカメレオン

description.en:
Garyou Hanagami is a veteran mangaka. Best known for the behemoth of a series that is Dragon Land, Hanagami-sensei has years of experience under his belt and is always thinking up new manga ideas. 

Shinobu Miyama is not. An amateur working for Hanagami-sensei as an assistant, Miyama is nicknamed “The Chameleon” for his ability to copy the artstyles of those he works under. However, his true dream is to escape the faceless crowds and become someone. 

So what happens when a work accident causes them to swap bodies?
description.fr:
Garyou Hanagami est un mangaka chevronné. Il est connu pour son oeuvre Dragon Land, le manga le plus populaire. Hanagami a des années d'expérience à son actif et déborde d'une créativité et d'une énergie folle.

Shinobu Miyama est un dessinateur travaillant pour Hanagami en tant qu'assistant libre. Miyama est surnommé "le caméléon" en raison de sa capacité à copier le style de n'importe quel artiste à la perfection. Cependant, son véritable rêve est de sortir de la masse et de devenir quelqu'un avec une grande renommée.

Suite a un accident, les deux mangaka échangent de corps. Garyou va maintenant devoir battre sa propre oeuvre, dans le corps d'un illustre inconnu.
Une bataille au sommet du manga commence ! 
Entre le dragon qui repart de zéro et le caméléon qui tente d'imiter cet animal céleste ! 

Qui va remporter le titre du meilleur mangaka ?!
description.ja: 天才漫画家・花神臥龍。彼を病的に羨む無名漫画家・深山忍。不慮の事故により二人の身体が入れ替わってしまい――!?最強のルーキーとなった漫画中毒の"龍"が灼熱の漫画業界を駆け昇る!!

altTitles.ja: ニクバミホネギシミ

description.en:
It was 1999, the year Nostradamus predicted the end of the human race.

Riding the unprecedented occult boom, Inubosaki, an editor of a third-rate occult magazine, is covering strange incidents with his cameraman Asama, who is also psychic. As Asama's psychic powers draw them together, the two encounter a number of terrifying and bizarre phenomena. Meanwhile, in the present day, 2023, an elderly Asama is visited by someone claiming to be Inubosaki's nephew.
description.ja: 1999年、それはノストラダムスが人類滅亡を予言した年。空前のオカルトブームにのり、三流オカルト雑誌の編集者・犬吠埼はカメラマンで霊感のある浅間を伴って奇妙な事件ばかりを取材していた。浅間の霊感に引き寄せられるように二人は恐ろしい怪奇現象に遭遇していくが……。一方、2023年の現代では年老いた浅間のもとに犬吠埼の事を調べる人物が訪れる。

title.en: The Errand Princess of the Inner Palace

altTitles.ja: 後宮の雑用姫

description.en:
Shaolan (Xiao Lian) is an orphaned girl who lives alone in the mountains at the very nook of an impoverished village. One day, an envoy from the palace arrives and scouts her to to be a lady-in-waiting for the imperial harem. This was how a wild girl raised on the mountains was able to live in a luxurious palace working as a lady-in-waiting, however...

On her first day (due to various reasons), Shaolan had suddenly become a criminal after slapping one of the consorts.

Though execution appeared certain, she was specially pardoned and demoted from a lady-in-waiting to a maidservant in charge of odd jobs. She is ridiculed by the other consorts as the, "Princess of Odd Jobs," however, this is where her rapid advance begins. She implements reforms to the worn-down palace and optimizes her chores through the knowledge she learned from her life of living in poverty, earning the gaze of the other ladies-in-waiting and the imperial consorts alike. Continuing these course of events, Shaolan's name spreads through the imperial palace, reaching even the emperor's ears...

After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

title.en: A Woman Who Is Too Honest Despite Her Kyoto Dialect

altTitles.ja: 京都弁なのに正直すぎる女

altTitles.ja-ro: Kyoto-ben na no ni Shoujiki Sugiru Onna

altTitles.vi: Cô gái ấy quá trung thực mặc cho giọng thổ ngữ Kyoto của mình

altTitles.en: A Girl Who Is Too Honest Despite Her Kyoto Dialect

title.en: The Invincible Summoner Who Crawled up From Level 1

altTitles.ja: レベル1から始まる召喚無双~俺だけ使える裏ダンジョンで、全ての転生者をぶっちぎる

altTitles.ja-ro: Level 1 kara Hajimaru Shoukan Musou - Ore dake Tsukaeru Ura Dungeon de, Subete no Tenseisha o Bucchigiru

altTitles.pt-br: Invocador inigualável  começa no nível 1: Destrua todas os transmigradores na masmorra secreta que só eu posso usar

altTitles.ja: レベル1から始まる召喚無双

description.en:
After losing his father in a tragic accident, Shinobu Iijima and his younger sister Megumi are taken in by their father’s old friend, Ayumu.

Shinobu works hard in the hopes of starting a new life for himself. Megumi, and a mobile game called La Vita Online, are the only things keeping him afloat.

One day, Ayumu reveals his true intentions of tearing Shinobu down and getting his hands on Megumi. But just after Shinobu learns that Ayumu deleted all of his game data in La Vita, their high-rise apartment catches on fire and Shinobu falls to his death, Megumi in tow. He wakes up in a strange new world... and realizes he’s been reincarnated into the world of La Vita Online.

An announcement from the devs tells him that Ayumu is already there, and a countdown to Megumi’s arrival is ticking. Shinobu vows to protect Megumi after she arrives at any cost, even if it means he has to crawl his way up from level 1 to fend off all the other reincarnated players.
description.id:
Shinobu Iijima kehilangan nyawanya bersama adik perempuan,
 Ketika dia bangun, dia sudah bereinkarnasi di dunia game yang dia mainkan.
 Shinobu putus asa untuk memulai permainan dari awal setelah ayah angkatnya menghapus data gamenya, tetapi dia mengetahui bahwa adik perempuannya akan segera bereinkarnasi di dunia ini juga.
 Untuk menghentikan ayah angkatnya menjadi pemain top yang mengincar tubuh adik perempuannya, dia akan memulai jalan menuju yang paling menyakitkan ...!
description.ja: 謎の災害で命を失い、自分のやっていたゲーム世界に転生されられた飯島忍。転生カンストプレイヤーの存在、転生したクズの義父、義父に体を狙われた妹、自分だけレベル１での転生――。逆境から這い上がり廃課金者たちを出し抜け!!
description.pt-br: Depois de perder seu pai em um trágico acidente, Shinobu Iijima e sua irmã mais nova, Megumi, são acolhidos pelo velho amigo do seu pai, Ayumu.Shinobu trabalha duro na esperança de começar uma nova vida para si mesmo. Sua irmã Megumi e um jogo para celular chamado La Vita Online são as únicas coisas que o mantêm à tona.Um dia, Ayumu revela suas verdadeiras intenções de derrubar Shinobu e colocar as mãos em Megumi. Mas logo depois que Shinobu descobre que Ayumu excluiu todos os dados de seus jogos no La Vita, o apartamento deles no arranha-céu pega fogo e Shinobu cai para a morte, com Megumi a seu lado. Ele acorda em um mundo novo e estranho... e percebe que reencarnou no mundo do La Vita Online.Um anúncio dos desenvolvedores diz a ele que Ayumu já estão lá e que a contagem regressiva para a chegada de Megumi está correndo. Shinobu jura proteger Megumi depois que ela chegar a qualquer custo, mesmo que isso signifique que ele tenha que rastejar desde o nível 1 para se defender de todos os outros transmigradores.

altTitles.ja: 現代転移の第二王子

altTitles.vi: Cuộc sống của Nhị hoàng tử bị dịch chuyển đến thế giới hiện đại

altTitles.ja: 彼女の友達

description.en: He got a cute girlfriend who was the first in his life, but her friend tempted him with a body that was lewder than her ... What would you do if your girlfriend's friend pressed you like this? A fascinating erotic story drawn by Jura from the popular doujin circle "JACK-POT".
description.ja: 人生で初めてできた、かわいい彼女。でもその友達は、彼女よりも豊満なカラダで僕を誘惑してきて…。彼女の友達にこんな風に迫られたら、あなたはどうしますか？ 大人気同人サークル「JACK-POT」のじゅらが描く、魅惑の背徳物語。
description.vi: Lần đầu tiên trong đời tôi có một cô bạn gái vô cùng dễ thương nhưng bạn cô ấy luôn cố dùng thân hình nóng bỏng của mình để cám dỗ tôi, phải làm sao đây?

altTitles.ja: 獄卒クラーケン

description.en: Controlling the Queendom of Sebek's female prison with the Power of the Kraken!
description.id: Shimizu Kuuma, seorang laki-laki, yang baru saja kembali dari wawancara kerja yang tidak bisa dia selesaikan, tiba-tiba dikirim ke dunia lain, di sana dia bertemu dengan seorang gadis tertentu yang membantunya dan memberinya pekerjaan di penjara tetapi yang tidak dia ketahui adalah bahwa ini hanya jebakan untuk membawanya dan agar dia bisa 'dinikmati' oleh Bosnya, kemudian setelah dia dibantai dan dibuang ke laut dan hampir mati dia diselamatkan oleh Kraken yang menceritakan kisahnya tentang bagaimana Dia diselamatkan oleh seorang gadis tertentu yang adalah seorang tahanan, jadi mereka membuat kesepakatan, kemudian dia menyelamatkan gadis itu dan melakukan Pembalasan.
description.ja: 就職難に悩む男子学生・クウマは、いきなり異世界に飛ばされてしまう。そこで女監獄・海獄城に連れて行かれたクウマは、海の覇者・魔獣クラーケンと融合し、絶大なイカの異能力を得る。陰謀で死刑囚にされたゼイナ姫の救出を託され、クウマは海獄城に獄卒として潜り込むが、そこには個性豊かな女囚たちが待ち受けていた……。クウマは女囚たちをイカの力で心もカラダも攻略し、ゼイナ姫を助けることが出来るのか!?
description.es-la: Shimizu Kuuma es un chico que siempre devuelve los favores. Un día, al regresar de una entrevista de trabajo fallida, es repentinamente transportado a otro mundo. En este mundo es salvado por una chica, quien le ofrece un trabajo como guardia de una prisión de mujeres. Sin pensarlo dos veces, Kuuma acepta, pero no se imaginó, que sería casi asesinado por una prisionera. Ellas tiran su cuerpo al mar, pero antes de morir, la criatura más fuerte del mar, el Kraken, lo salva y le ofrece fusionarse con él a cambio de algo. Es así como Kuuma sobrevive, consigue los poderes del Kraken y está dispuesto a tomar el control de la prisión para devolverle el favor al Kraken.

description.en:
In the world where the sea level has risen, the sea has already covered the continent.   
In the world where the land can not be found anymore, the family of the boy, 'Bota', lives in a small boat and wanders around.   
  
I am looking for another 'man' somewhere and I am safe in the rules that my father has set.
description.vi: Trong một thế giới nơi mực nước biển đã dâng cao và đại dương đã bao phủ toàn bộ lục địa, đất liền không còn tồn tại nữa. Gia đình của cậu bé tên Bota sống trên một con thuyền nhỏ và lang thang khắp nơi. Tôi đang tìm kiếm một "người" nào đó ở đâu đó và an toàn trong những quy tắc mà cha tôi đã đặt ra.
description.pt-br: O mundo foi submerso e monstros marinhos governam a terra. Será que Bota e sua família irão conseguir escapar desse inferno marítimo? E quem diabos é Kana...?!

altTitles.ja: 戦車椅子－ＴＡＮＫ　ＣＨＡＩＲ－

description.en:
Protecting his sister Shizuka from a bullet, the strongest assassin Nagi Taira falls into a coma. Against all odds, he regains his consciousness- but only when faced with killing intent! Thus begins a violent journey of recovery, battling the most dangerous foes.

---
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10517/episode/349974) (U.S. Only)
description.ja: 妹を銃弾から守ったことで意識戻らぬ身となってしまった最強の殺し屋・平良凪（タイラナギ）。しかし彼は“殺意”を向けられると、わずかな時間だけ意識が戻る特殊体質の持ち主だった！完全覚醒を果たすため、今日も凪は改造車椅子で強敵達との“リハビリ”を始める――！鬼才・やしろ学が描く最凶のダークヒーローによるバイオレンス・アクション――ッ!!
description.vi: Sau khi đỡ hộ em gái mình một phát đạn, Taira Nagi tuy rằng may mắn không chết nhưng giờ đây cậu đã bị mất đi ý thức, sống như người thực vật. Vậy nhưng miễn chỉ cần cảm nhận được sát ý với mình, Nagi sẽ lập tức lấy lại được ý thức và điều này đã được em gái cậu áp dụng cho phương pháp điều trị nhằm cứu lấy anh trai của mình.
description.pt-br: Ao proteger sua irmã Shizuka de um tiro, o assassino mais forte, Nagi Taira, entra em coma. Contra todas as probabilidades, ele recupera a consciência — mas apenas quando enfrenta intenções assassinas! Assim começa uma violenta jornada de recuperação e batalhas contra os inimigos mais perigosos!!

title.en: Drama na Koi wa Kihon kara

altTitles.ja: ドラマな恋は基本から

altTitles.ja-ro: Drama na Koi ha Kihon kara

altTitles.en: Dramatic Love Starts from the Basics

description.en: Shinji Yuuki is an ordinary businessman, 35 years old, single, no girlfriend, living at home. He is worried about his future as a single man, but he has little experience in love and is afraid of marriage activity. But when he meets a female  doctor, he falls in "love beyond his imagination," a love that turns his life upside down!
description.ja: 「35歳独身、彼女なし、実家暮らし」の平凡なサラリーマン・悠木慎史。独りで生きる未来に不安があるけれど、恋愛経験は少ないし婚活も怖い――。そんな悠木が、とあるアクシデントで医師・伴瑛理子と出会い、人生がひっくり返る「想像以上の恋」に落ちる！ 　大ヒット社会人恋愛漫画『この会社に好きな人がいます』の榎本あかまるが贈る、ミドサーから始める恋愛トレーニング!!
description.pt-br:
A vida de Shinji Yuuki dá uma guinada inesperada quando ele conhece uma médica, despertando um amor que desafia seus medos e incertezas. Seu mundo ordinário como empresário é jogado no caos, à medida que esse novo afeto o tira da zona de conforto e o obriga a enfrentar suas ansiedades mais profundas sobre relacionamentos e o futuro.

Há alguma direção específica que você gostaria que essa história tomasse, ou desafios particulares que Shinji possa enfrentar ao navegar por esse romance inesperado?

altTitles.ja-ro: Koi wa Sekai Seifuku no Ato de

altTitles.ja: 恋は世界征服のあとで

altTitles.fr: L'amour vient après la conquête du monde

description.en:
In the eyes of the public, Fudou Aikawa and Desumi Magahara are sworn enemies who have nothing in common. Fudou, also known as “Red Gelato,” is the leader of the hero squadron “Gelato 5,” whose mission is to bring about world peace. On the other hand, Desumi is the minion leader of “Gecko,” a villainous organization seeking world domination. However, despite these differences, their relationship is not quite what it seems. When they are not making a show of being at each other’s throats, Desumi and Fudou continue to pursue a forbidden love.

Going on dates, baking sweets for one another, and meeting up as often as they can despite their hectic schedules, the two inexperienced lovebirds pave the way for their own unique relationship. Though their public lives are worlds apart, Fudou and Desumi will stop at nothing to make their seemingly impossible romance work.
description.ja: 【説明しよう！】世界平和を目指すヒーロー戦隊「ジェラート５（ファイブ）」のリーダー、相川不動（あいかわふどう）と、世界征服を目論む秘密結社「ゲッコー」の戦闘員リーダー、禍原デス美（まがはらですみ）…二人の間には組織の壁を越えた深い“因縁”があったのだ…!!
description.pt-br:
Aos olhos do público, Fudou Aikawa e Desumi Magahara são inimigos jurados que não têm nada em comum. Fudou, também conhecido como “Red Gelato”, é o líder do esquadrão de heróis “Gelato 5”, cuja missão é trazer a paz mundial. Por outro lado, Desumi é a líder dos lacaios de “Gecko”, uma organização vil que busca dominar o mundo. No entanto, apesar dessas diferenças, o relacionamento deles não é exatamente o que parece. Quando eles não estão fingindo estar na garganta um do outro, Desumi e Fudou continuam perseguindo um amor proibido , saindo para encontros, fazendo doces um para o outro e encontrando-se sempre que podem, apesar de suas agendas lotadas, os dois pombinhos inexperientes abrem caminho para seu relacionamento único. Embora suas vidas públicas sejam de mundos separados, Fudou e Desumi não vão parar por nada para fazer seu romance aparentemente impossível funcionar.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 4, Cap 23. ]

title.en: Drawing: Saikyou Mangaka wa Oekaki Skill de Isekai Musou Suru!

altTitles.ja: ドローイング 最強漫画家はお絵かきスキルで異世界無双する！

altTitles.en: Drawing: The Greatest Mangaka Becomes a Skilled “Martial Artist” in Another World

altTitles.zh-hk: 作畫 最強漫畫家利用繪畫技能在異世界開無雙！

altTitles.vi: Drawing: Mangaka Mạnh Nhất Với Kỹ Năng Vẽ Tranh Vô Song Tại Dị Giới

description.en:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life.. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?
description.ja: 漫画家として大成功を収めていた神代彰は、成功だけに囚われて人間関係を蔑ろにし続けた自分の人生を後悔しながら死んでしまう。そんな彰を待っていたのは、自分で母親を選んで異世界転生するチャンス！？転生した彰は剣術も魔法もダメダメだったが、家族に愛されながら平穏な生活を送っていた。しかしあるとき、「絵を描く」ことでいろいろなものを具現化できるチート能力に気がついてしまって……？
description.vi: Akira, một họa sĩ tài năng nhưng sau khi bị bệnh ung thư anh đã nhận ra xung quanh mình chẳng còn gì ngoại trừ cái danh hiệu "thành công" của mình. Không có người đi cùng mình đến bệnh viện, người mẹ, người thân duy nhất của anh cũng đòi anh đưa tiền mới chịu đi cùng anh. Trong cơn giận anh đã vô tình gây tai nạn và được chuyển sinh sang thế giới khác. Một thế giới mới với một cuộc sống mới anh quyết định sống một cách bình thường và giữ gìn hạnh phúc gia đình nhỏ nhoi của mình
description.pt-br: Akira Kamidai lamenta ter conseguido construir apenas uma relação vazia, embora tenha feito muito sucesso como cartunista. Uma vida em um lugar medíocre onde eu queria que Akira fosse uma pessoa com magia. Reencarnação em uma loja voltada para a esgrima. Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Eu estava vivendo uma vida ideal para uma família amada por espadachins. Descobri a habilidade de trapaça que encarnar várias coisas atravéz de um ”desenho”…? Uma aventura mundial diferente para proteger seu paradeiro, tecida por Akira que quer levar uma vida normal...!

altTitles.ja: 葬送のフリーレン

altTitles.th: คำอธิษฐานในวันที่จากลา Frieren

altTitles.el: Φρίρεν: Πέρα από το Τέλος του Ταξιδιού

altTitles.de: Frieren: Nach dem Ende der Reise

altTitles.es-la: Frieren: Más allá del fin del viaje

description.el: Έχοντας νικήσει τον βασιλιά των δαιμόνων, το ταξίδι μιας δεκαετίας φτάνει στο τέλος του και μια νέα εποχή ειρήνης ξεκινά. Η ζωή όμως συνεχίζεται, ειδικά για την Φρίρεν, πως ως ξωτικό έχει ακόμα αιώνες ζωής μπροστά της. Με τις δεκαετίες να περνάνε, η Φρίρεν έρχεται αντιμέτωπη με την μεταβλητότητα του κόσμου και την παροδικότητα των ανθρώπων. Μετά από μια τελευταία συνάντηση με όλη την παλιά της ομάδα, συνειδητοποιεί ότι ο χρόνος που πέρασε με τους φίλους της ήταν υπερβολικά σύντομος και ότι δεν θα έχει ποτέ την ευκαιρία να τους μάθει καλύτερα. Έρχοντας αντιμέτωπη με την αλήθεια αυτή, η Φρίρεν αποφασίζει να ξεκινήσει ένα ακόμα ταξίδι αλλά αυτή τη φορά έχοντας σκοπό να μάθει το τι σημαίνει να είσαι άνθρωπος.
description.en: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
description.es: Frieren es una elfa, y como para todos los de su raza, los años pasan en un suspiro… pero no es así para sus antiguos compañeros de batalla, a los que Frieren verá morir y envejecer. De repente Frieren se da cuenta de que pese a que la vida avanza a un ritmo más lento para ella, las experiencias con sus seres queridos se le escapan de las manos. Un aire nostálgico envuelve a este manga fantástico tan entrañable que ha vendido ya más de 2,5 millones de copias en Japón.
description.fr:
Que deviennent les héros une fois le mal vaincu ?
Dans ce coffret collector : un jeu de 54 cartes entièrement personnalisé aux couleurs de la série et le manga avec une jaquette alternative réversible !

Alors que Frieren et ses compagnons font halte dans la citadelle de Heiß, Stark propose à Fern d'aller en rendez-vous, sur le ton de la plaisanterie... et contre toute attente, la jeune fille accepte ! Sur les conseils de l'elfe, qui n'y connaît pas grand-chose, le guerrier emmène donc son amie faire le tour de la ville, ce qui leur permet de se rapprocher un peu.

Après cette pause bienvenue, les trois aventuriers repartent sur les routes et arrivent au haut-plateau du Nord, une zone extrêmement dangereuse où pullulent aussi bien des monstres coriaces que des démons retors... Parviendront-ils à survivre dans cette région hostile ?
description.vi: Tổ đội anh hùng đã đánh bại được quỷ vương và kết thúc cuộc hành trình của họ. Nhưng thế chưa phải là hết, cuộc đời của cô nàng pháp sư Elf này sẽ còn rất dài, hơn cả những người đồng đội cũ của cô, một cuộc phiêu lưu mới để cô trải qua nhiều cung bậc cảm xúc, cũng như là học hỏi thêm về con người.
description.es-la: Tras cumplir su misión de derrotar al Rey Demonio, la maga elfo Frieren, el héroe Himmel, el sacerdote Heiter y el guerrero Eisen regresan a casa después de un viaje de una década donde disolverán su grupo y tomarán sus propios caminos. Pero el tiempo pasa de forma distinta para los elfos, Frieren comienza a ser testigo de como sus excompañeros sufren sus estragos y comienzan a morir lentamente y uno a uno. Antes de fallecer, Heiter el sacerdote, le impone a Frieren un aprendiz humana llamada Fern. Llevados por la afición que tiene la alfa por recolectar hechizos mágicos, ambos emprenderán una aventura, llena de magia e introspección, que los llevará a revisitar lugares que había conocido en su anterior travesía, mientras enfrenta el pesar que le causa descubrir todas las posibilidades que ha desperdiciado en su viaje que le hubiesen posibilitado entablar una relación más cercana con sus compañeros ahora fallecidos.
description.zh-hk: 在打倒了魔王的勇者一行人当中，魔法使芙莉莲是精灵，她和其他三人有不一样的地方。 生活在“之后”的世界里，她感受到了什么—— 留下来的人们所编织的葬送与祈祷又意味着什么—— 故事从“冒险的结束”开始。 这是讲述英雄们的活法的，后日谈奇幻作品！

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: The Story of Our Corpse Hunt

altTitles.ja: ぼくたちの死体さがし

description.en:
A boy x a summer x an adventure = "Boy Meets Crime"!

Shocking juvenile suspense!

One day during the summer vacation, a young boy called Isshin, Kazuma Inui, leaves with his friends who attend the same junior high school to meet again with "that girl" who disappeared several years ago.
And all the truths lead to child kidnapping cases that are rampant in the land. Depicting the darkness of society!

altTitles.ja: 新テニスの王子様

description.en: The exclusive Japanese U-17 training camp was previously only open to the top high school players in the country. All of this changes when 50 of the nation's best middle school players are selected to join the esteemed training facility—including 12-year-old tennis prodigy Echizen Ryoma. But what seems like an ordinary training camp quickly becomes something far greater than any of the middle schoolers are expecting. The climb to the top of the Japanese tennis world is perilous, but even that journey pales in comparison to the world stage that awaits beyond the summit.

title.en: The Otome Heroine's Fight for Survival

altTitles.ja: 乙女ゲームのヒロインで最強サバイバル
乙女ゲームのヒロインで最強サバイバル＠ＣＯＭＩＣ

altTitles.ja-ro: Otome Game no Heroine de Saikyou Survival

altTitles.fr: L'héroine d'un jeu otome survie en devenant la plus forte

altTitles.en: Strongest Survival with an Otome Game's Heroine

description.en:
Orphaned by a monster attack on her village, young Alicia spends three horrid years in an orphanage before finally running away. When she flees, however, Alicia has a violent encounter with an older woman hell-bent on killing her. During their tussle, she comes into contact with a strange crystal that bestows upon her a wealth of knowledge, transforming her from an innocent child into a cool and calculated planner. Now aware that she was meant to be the protagonist of an otome game and disgusted with her supposed fate, Alicia decides to take matters into her own hands and become strong—by any means necessary. Using her newfound knowledge, and with some help from a stranger she meets in the woods, she learns to survive by herself in a world far too harsh and unforgiving for a girl her age. Ready or not, she’s determined to carve her own path.

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-otome-heroine-s-fight-for-survival)
description.ja:
剣と魔法の世界シエルで孤児として生きていた少女アーリシア。
ある日、彼女は自分が“乙女ゲームのヒロイン”であると知ってしまう。
両親の死さえ単にストーリーの一部だったのだ。
アーリシアはヒロインの役割を「くだらない」と一刀両断すると、冒険者『アリア』を名乗り、次第に複数の武器と魔法を操る「殺戮（さつりく）の灰かぶり姫」へと成長していく！
だが、“悪役令嬢”の護衛依頼を受けたことで、気付かぬ間に貴族同士が争うゲームの舞台に巻き込まれていき――？
「私は“私”だ。ゲームの登場人物じゃない！」
武器を作れ！　技を鍛えろ！
強敵との戦いに生き残り、乙女ゲームをぶち壊せ！
戦うヒロインが魅せる、壮絶＆爽快な異世界バトルファンタジー！

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1391fj/)
Light Novel: [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B09FF4Y8C2), [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/286726/)
Original Web Publication: [Corona EX](https://to-corona-ex.com/comics/20000000054623), [Nico Video](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/54623)
description.ru:
В мире меча и магии, что звался Сиэль, жила сирота по имени Алисия.
Однажды она узнала, что является героиней отомэ-игры, в которой даже смерть её родителей была лишь частью сценария. Расценив положение героини полнейшим абсурдом, она решительно его отвергнула. Она переродилась как авантюристка Ария, и шаг за шагом мастерски овладела широким арсеналом оружия и магии. Её величали «Пепельная принцесса резни»! Однако, взявшись за задание по охране «злодейки», Алисия, опомниться не успев, обнаружила себя втянутой в конфликты знати…

«Я - это я, а не персонаж какой-то игры!»

Выковать оружие! Закалить тело!
Выжить в борьбе против могущественных врагов и разнести эту чёртову отомэ-игру!
Захватывающая битва нашей героини в величественном мире меча и магии!

title.en: Tonari no Neko to Koi Shirazu

altTitles.ja: となりの猫と恋知らず
となねこ

altTitles.en: Learning to Love My Cat-like Classmate
The Feline Neighbor and the Unversed-in-Love

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng mèo ngủ gật và Chàng trai hướng nội

description.en:
Minato Seno’s high school life had just begun when his homeroom teacher requested his help with Nekozane, the cat-like chronic napper who sits next to him in class. Timid and socially anxious, Minato has never talked to her or even seen her face. But when he finally musters up the courage to wake Nekozane, she unexpectedly hugs him on the spot! Thus begins a sweet tale of two teens awkwardly stumbling into a new friendship, unaware that their feelings are slowly turning into something more!

(Source: Manga UP! Global)
description.ja:
**もっと知りたい きみのこと**
高校1年生・瀬野湊（せのみなと）。新学期早々に担任の教師から頼まれたのは、となりの席でいつも寝ている猫実（ねこざね）さんのこと。超人見知り&引っ込み思案な性格な瀬野…。会話どころか顔すら見たことがない猫実さんを勇気を出して起こそうとしたら、急に彼女から抱きつかれて――!?友達未満なふたりが紡ぐ、無自覚ラブコメ開幕♪

altTitles.ja: ドッグスレッド

description.en:
"If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?"

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaido. 

The year is 2010. Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.

Now nicknamed "the Rabid Prince," Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!

Change, grow, evolve! Turn defeat into victory in this red-hot redemption story!

altTitles.ja: 天より高く

description.en: When the Devil King announces his retirement, he calls forth his two sons, Yomi and Sora, to give them each a quest. Whichever of them finds a pure Yamato maiden within a year would inherit the throne of the Devil King, while the other would die. Thus begins Sora's sex-fuelled adventure to find a woman that can satisfy his father…

altTitles.ja: 三咲くんは攻略キャラじゃない

altTitles.ja-ro: Misaki-kun wa Kouryaku Chara ja Nai

description.en: Misaki-kun may be adorable, but he's just the 'best friend' type character you can find in any gal game. However, the protagonist, Kihara Hareta, isn't set on wooing any of the heroines; he has his eyes set on the Unobtainable Misaki-kun!
description.ja: ここはギャルゲーの世界。 親友キャラ・三咲泉の使命は、主人公・季原晴太のヒロイン攻略のサポート…のはずが、 肝心の季原は何故か三咲を攻略するつもりで――!? 「男の子のままヒロインになってくれ！」 友情？愛情？男の娘ハッピー胸キュンコメディ!!

altTitles.ja: フェイト／ステイナイト ヘブンズフィール

description.en:
The story takes place in an ordinary Japanese town, Fuyuki City. Hidden from society, there has been a deadly war going on in this town. Seven sorcerers known as "Masters" summon powerful familiars called "Servants," and they all fight each other until the last one. The last one is said to attain the Holy Grail, which will grant them a wish. Only few know when this War started and what the Holy Grail is, but the war is about to begin again this year.  
  
The main character is Emiya Shirou, who lost his parents in a fire and was adopted by a man who called himself a mage. Admiring his stepfather, he has been training himself to be a mage. However, he had no talent and he could barely use even one type of magecraft. His stepfather has already passed away, and today he's a mage without any skills or knowledge. He is involved in the Holy Grail War when he accidentally summons Saber, who is said to be the strongest Servant of all…  
  
Heaven's Feel is one of the routes in Fate/stay night. The heroine of this route is Matou Sakura.
description.es: 10 años después de la Guerra del Santo Grial, una batalla librada por Maestros y Sirvientes por el recipiente que concede los deseos, el Santo Grial, estalla otra guerra en la ciudad de Fuyuki. Shirou Emiya, el hijo adoptivo de Kiritsugu Emiya, participante de la Guerra del Santo Grial anterior, lleva una vida pacífica con sus seres queridos. Especialmente cerca de él está su estudiante de primer año Sakura Matou, quien trae bondad a su vida solitaria. Pero una vez que comienza la Guerra del Santo Grial, la vida pacífica de Shirou se rompe.
description.ru: Действие разворачивается в обыкновенном японском городке Фуюки. В нем проходит смертельная война, скрытая от общества. Семеро магов, Мастеров, призывают души великих героев прошлого, называемых Слугами, которые сражаются между собой. Последний оставшийся обретет Святой Грааль, способный выполнить желание. Лишь некоторые знают про эту войну и Святой Грааль, но в этом году война начинается вновь.Главный герой - Эмия Широ, потерявший родителей в пожаре и усыновленный человеком, называвшим себя магом. Восхищаясь отчимом, он тренируется чтобы стать чародеем, однако, не обладая талантом, он едва ли может использовать один вид магии. Его отчим умер, и сегодня Широ маг без каких-либо умений и знаний. Он становится участником Войны Святого Грааля, когда случайно призывает Сэйбер - сильнейшую из Слуг…Манга-адаптация "Heaven's Feel" - одного из рутов в эроге "Fate/stay night" от компании Type-Moon. Героиня рута - Мато Сакура.

title.en: Busaneko ni Kaerareta Kiyowa Reijou desu ga, Saikyou no Gunjin Koushaku ni Hirowarete Kizetsu Sunzen desu

altTitles.ja: ブサ猫に変えられた気弱令嬢ですが、最恐の軍人公爵に拾われて気絶寸前です

altTitles.en: A Timid Lady was Turned into an Ugly Cat, but on the Verge of Fainting is Picked up by the Most Fearsome Military Duke

description.en:
Cursed to be an ugly cat--but maybe you're happy!

"I'll have you turn into a cat, sister." Marie, the viscount's young daughter, lost her fiancé to her younger sister Emilia and has been cursed even more. Her reflection in the mirror - an ugly cat!

Running away from her sister for her life, Marie, who escaped from their house, collapsed from loneliness and hunger, unable to speak. Then, a kind hand reaches out to her, "In the middle of this rain, poor thing...Would you like to come with me?" 
The figure is the "ruthless, merciless, undefeated duke" who is rumored even in social circles.

An unfortunate girl gets her one and only happiness, and a happy cat life begins!
description.ja:
呪われてブサ猫に――でももしかして幸せかも！？

「お姉さまには、猫にでもなってもらうわ」妹エミリアに婚約者を奪われ、さらに呪いをかけられた子爵令嬢マリー。鏡に映った彼女の姿は――ブサ猫！？

命からがら妹の元から逃げ出したものの、声も出せず孤独と空腹で倒れ伏したマリーだったが、そこに優しい手が差し伸べられる。「こんな雨の中、可哀想に…私と一緒に来るか？」その姿は、”冷酷無慈悲の無敗の公爵”と社交界でも噂の人物で――。

不遇の少女が唯一無二の幸せを手に入れる、幸せ猫ライフスタートです！

altTitles.ja: 7人の眠り姫

description.en: A wandering prince set off to break an ancient curse bewitching the Kingdom of Amaryllis by waking up its princess with a kiss of true love. However, nobody told him there were 7 princesses to kiss and he must now take responsibility by living with them while they find out why the people of Amaryllis are unable to wake up. Will they reach a happily ever after?
description.fr: Un prince errant est parti pour briser une ancienne malédiction qui ensorcelle le royaume d'Amaryllis en réveillant sa princesse par un baiser d'amour véritable. Cependant, personne ne lui a dit qu'il y avait 7 princesses à embrasser et il doit maintenant prendre ses responsabilités en vivant avec elles pendant qu'ils découvrent pourquoi les habitants d'Amaryllis sont incapables de se réveiller. Parviendront-ils à être heureux pour toujours ?
description.ru:
Герой пришел спасти спящую принцессу от проклятья злой ведьмы, но когда он добрался до места... Там оказалось 7 девушек!
Принц Рудбекии - Алек и семь принцесс, в стране, где они единственные бодрствующие, начинают свою совместную жизнь, чтобы освободить всех ото сна!
description.pt-br: Um príncipe errante partiu para quebrar uma antiga maldição que enfeitiça o Reino de Amaryllis, tentando despertar sua princesa com um beijo de amor verdadeiro. No entanto, ninguém lhe disse que havia sete princesas para beijar! Agora ele precisa assumir a responsabilidade, vivendo com elas enquanto descobrem por que o povo de Amaryllis está incapaz de despertar. Será que eles conseguirão um final feliz?

altTitles.ja: アズールレーン４コママンガ　びそくぜんしんっ！

description.en: Official 4-koma webcomic from the popular mobile game Azur Lane.

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.ja: 魔都精兵のスレイブ

altTitles.vi: Nô lệ của đội tinh nhuệ Ma đô

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.vi:
Chiều không gian đầy quỷ dữ được gọi là "Ma đô" đã mở ra đe dọa đối với loài người. Tại đó, có một loài  "đào" ban cho kẻ ăn sức mạnh đặc biệt, giúp nhân loại có cơ hội chiến đấu, tuy nhiên, chỉ có nữ giới mới có thể sử dụng thứ sức mạnh "trái đào" ấy. Bởi vậy mà phụ nữ trở thành những người bảo vệ loài người, địa vị xã hội tăng cao, trong khi nam giới bị giáng xuống tầng lớp công dân hạng hai, giành giật nhau những công việc cơ bản và sự thừa nhận.

Nhân vật chính Yuuki Wakura, một nam sinh chăm chỉ yêu nội trợ, chị gái cậu đã bị bắt trong một sự kiện của Ma đô 5 năm về trước. Khi đang than thở về những khó khăn gặp phải, cậu đã bị lũ quỷ tấn công. Nhờ được đội trưởng Kyouka của Đội chống Quỷ kịp thời ứng cứu, cậu chấp nhận trở thành "nô lệ" của cô để có thể sở hữu sức mạnh tiêu diệt bầy quỷ.

Bất ngờ thay, việc làm "nô lệ" đòi hỏi một cái giá tương xứng...và người phải trả giá lại không phải là cậu.
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

altTitles.en: Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan
The Youngest Son of a Renowned Family of Swordsmen
Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan

altTitles.es-la: El hijo menor del maestro de la espada

description.en:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!

“너는 이 힘을 어떻게 사용하고 싶더냐?”

전생의 기억과 압도적인 재능, 그리고 신과의 계약
